steps.name: Application Submission
steps.description: Submit application documents to HTW Dresden
steps.deadline: 15 June for winter semester, 15 November for summer semester

steps.name: Application Review
steps.description: Review of application documents by HTW Dresden

steps.name: Letter of Admission
steps.description: Issue of Letter of Admission by HTW Dresden

required_documents.name: Application for Admission
required_documents.description: Signed by you and your home university coordinator
required_documents.deadline: 15 June for winter semester, 15 November for summer semester

steps.name: Obtain Health Insurance
steps.description: Students from outside EU or EEA countries must take out a German health insurance.

steps.name: Prove Statutory Health Insurance
steps.description: Students from EU or EEA countries, Switzerland, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Montenegro, North Macedonia, Serbia, Turkey, Tunisia, or the United Kingdom must show their European Health Insurance Card or Global Health Insurance Card.

steps.name: Register with Statutory Health Insurance Provider
steps.description: Students under the age of 30 can register with a statutory health insurance provider.

steps.name: Obtain Exemption for Private Health Insurance
steps.description: Students under the age of 30 who have private health insurance must obtain an exemption from the statutory health insurance obligation.

dependencies.description: Letter of Admission from HTW Dresden is required for registration with a statutory health insurance provider.
dependencies.next_step: Register with Statutory Health Insurance Provider

required_documents.name: Letter of Admission
required_documents.description: Required for registration with a statutory health insurance provider.

steps.name: Check immigration formalities
steps.description: Check the immigration formalities available from the Federal Foreign Office and the German missions in your home country.

steps.name: Obtain a passport
steps.description: Obtain a passport if you do not already have one.

steps.name: Arrange insurance and permits
steps.description: Arrange insurance and the necessary permits before leaving your home country.

steps.name: Apply for visa (if required)
steps.description: Apply for a student visa at the German embassy in your home country if you are a non-EU citizen and plan to stay in Germany for more than three months.
steps.deadline: Several weeks/month before your planned entry to Germany

steps.name: Apply for residence permit (if required)
steps.description: Apply for a residence permit at the Dresden Immigration Office if you are an EU citizen or if you are a non-EU citizen staying in Germany for less than 360 days.
steps.deadline: Within three months after entry in Germany

dependencies.description: Application for mobility to the Federal Office for Migration and Refugees (BAMF) must be submitted by the host university.

required_documents.name: Residence permit for study purposes from the first EU Member State
required_documents.description: Valid passport, Declaration on securing livelihood, Declaration of sufficient health insurance cover.
required_documents.deadline: Before applying for visa or residence permit

steps.name: Register at Studentenwerk Dresden
steps.description: Use the online application procedure to register for a student residence.

steps.name: Apply for accommodation
steps.description: Submit the application with a copy of the admission letter from HTW Dresden.

steps.name: Wait for confirmation
steps.description: Receive confirmation from Studentenwerk Dresden regarding your accommodation application.

steps.name: Check for alternative options
steps.description: Look for other accommodation options if the student residence application is unsuccessful.

steps.name: Finalize arrangements
steps.description: Secure your chosen accommodation and complete any necessary paperwork.
